message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. After careful consideration, we believe it would be valuable to you. Our initial offer for this exceptional item is $1500000. We're confident it will meet your needs and expectations.
I'm very interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900000. Can we meet in the middle?

Thank you for your interest in our product, Bob. I understand your perspective and appreciate your input. To find a mutually beneficial solution, we propose an adjusted price of $1100000 for the product. We believe this offers a fair compromise between our initial offer and your counteroffer.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I was thinking more along the lines of $950000. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my previous offer.

Thank you for your continued interest, Bob. We've carefully considered your most recent offer and are proposing a counteroffer of $1000000 for the product. This reflects a compromise that takes into account both our initial offer and your counteroffers thus far.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I was thinking more along the lines of $975000. I'm trying to find a mutually beneficial price, and I believe this is a fair compromise.

Thank you for your patience and understanding, Bob. In light of your latest offer, we propose a counteroffer of $987500 for the product. This figure aims to find a balance between our initial asking price and your counteroffers, while still reflecting the value of the product.

I appreciate your persistence, and I'm willing to meet you halfway from my previous offer. I'm thinking more along the lines of $980000. I believe this is a fair price for the product, considering its value and our previous negotiations.

Thank you for your commitment to finding a fair price, Bob. Based on our discussions, we would like to propose a counteroffer of $985000 for the product. This figure represents a reasonable compromise that respects both the value of the product and our negotiation history.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still not sure if $985000 is the best value for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my previous offer, so I'm thinking more along the lines of $982500. This is my final offer, and I hope we can come to a mutually beneficial agreement.
